item.name: Get a specific category by ID
Get all subcategories for a category
Get a specific subcategory by ID
Get all sub-subcategories for a subcategory
Get a specific sub-subcategory by ID

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Updated Android Phones",
    "description": "Updated Android operating system smartphones",
    "imageUrl": "https://example.com/images/updated-android.jpg",
    "subCategoryId":"68b5a426-a739-4e9e-b76f-80fa707d8e8e",
    "status": "ACTIVE"
  }

{
    "name": "iPhone 14 Pro",
    "description": "Apple iPhone 14 Pro smartphone with A16 Bionic chip",//optional
    "displayName": "iPhone 14 Pro (128GB)",//optional
    "keepingUnits": 10,
    "imageUrls": [
        "https://example.com/image1.jpg",
        "https://example.com/image2.jpg"
    ],//optional
    "warrantyMonths": 12, //optional,
    "loyaltyPoints":  10 ,
    "status": "ACTIVE",//or HIDE
    "shopId": "shop-uuid-here",
    "supplierId": "supplier-uuid-here",//optional
    "categoryId": "category-uuid-here",//optional
    "subCategoryId": "subcategory-uuid-here",//optional
    "subSubCategoryId": "subsubcategory-uuid-here"//optional
}

{
    "name": "iPhone 14 Pro Max",
    "description": "Updated description for Apple iPhone 14 Pro Max",
    "displayName": "iPhone 14 Pro Max (256GB)",
    "keepingUnits": 15,
    "imageUrls": [
        "https://example.com/updated-image1.jpg",
        "https://example.com/updated-image2.jpg"
    ],
    "status": "ACTIVE",
    "supplierId": "new-supplier-uuid-here",
    "categoryId": "new-category-uuid-here",
    "subCategoryId": "new-subcategory-uuid-here",
    "subSubCategoryId": "new-subsubcategory-uuid-here"
}
